Description: St Joseph watering a donkey and turning round to listen to the angel telling him to flee to Egypt; on the right, Virgin holding sleeping Child and looking at the angel; set in landscape with classical ruins Etching
Curator's comments: Described as part of a set of six etchings depicting the flight into Egypt and engraved in 1653/57 in cat. exhib. 'Sébastien Bourdon' (Paris, 2000), No.175-180.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Lady Juliana St Aubyn
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir John St Aubyn (L.1534)
